languages.text: {n}Маражай дергает головой.{/n} "Увечный огир. Взгляни, как он сучит конечностями... я впервые вижу подобное. Что бы ни стало причиной подобного изъяна — сила воздействия была поистине велика".
{n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай дергает головой.{/n} "Увечный огир. Взгляни, как он сучит конечностями... я впервые вижу подобное. Что бы ни стало причиной подобного изъяна — сила воздействия была поистине велика".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... Never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect, the force applied was great indeed."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mueve bruscamente la cabeza.{/n} «Un Oghyr lisiado. Mira cómo se retuercen sus extremidades... Nunca había visto algo así. Sea lo que sea que haya causado este defecto, su poder es tremendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mueve bruscamente la cabeza.{/n} «Un Oghyr lisiado. Mira cómo se retuercen sus extremidades... Nunca había visto algo así. Sea lo que sea que haya causado este defecto, su poder es tremendo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai secoue la tête.{/n} « Un Oghyr mutilé. Regardez comme ses membres tremblent... Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel. Je ne sais pas ce qui a causé cette défectuosité, mais cela a nécessité une grande force. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai secoue la tête.{/n} « Un Oghyr mutilé. Regardez comme ses membres tremblent... Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel. Je ne sais pas ce qui a causé cette défectuosité, mais cela a nécessité une grande force. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがグッと顔を引く。{/n}「障がい持ちのオフィアか。手が痙攣してるぜ…こんなのは見たことがねえ。この不良を起こしたやつは、すごい力を秘めていたに違いねえな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがグッと顔を引く。{/n}「障がい持ちのオフィアか。手が痙攣してるぜ…こんなのは見たことがねえ。この不良を起こしたやつは、すごい力を秘めていたに違いねえな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋摇了摇头。{/n}“是个残废的遗落者，看看它四肢抽搐的样子吧……我从来没见过这样的东西。虽然不知道是什么东西把它弄坏了，但肯定是相当强大的力量。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋摇了摇头。{/n}“是个残废的遗落者，看看它四肢抽搐的样子吧……我从来没见过这样的东西。虽然不知道是什么东西把它弄坏了，但肯定是相当强大的力量。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zuckt mit dem Kopf.{/n} "Ein verkrüppelter Oghyr. Seht, wie er mit den Gliedern zuckt ... So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen. Was diesen Defekt auch verursacht hat, es steckte gewaltige Kraft dahinter."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zuckt mit dem Kopf.{/n} "Ein verkrüppelter Oghyr. Seht, wie er mit den Gliedern zuckt ... So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen. Was diesen Defekt auch verursacht hat, es steckte gewaltige Kraft dahinter."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, başını geriye atıyor.{/n} "Kötürüm bir Oghyr. Uzuvlarındaki titreyişe bakın... Hiç böyle bir şey görmemiştim. Bu kusura ne yol açtıysa arkasında büyük bir güç olmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head.{/n} "A crippled Oghyr. Look at it twitch its limbs... I have never seen anything like it. Whatever caused this defect had great force behind it."
